summary: A popular girl has to choose whether she wants to stay as a part of her clique or fall for the brooding literature-loving boy in her school.
cast: Dian Sastrowardoyo|Nicholas Saputra|Ladya Cheryl|Titi Kamal|Adinia Wirasti|Sissy Priscillia|Gito Rollies|Hendra Perdana|Edi Brokoli|Febian Ricardo|Dennis Adhiswara|Pramana Padmodarmaya|Mang Diman|Frans Tumbuan|Rininta Boer|Joshua Pandelaki|Rico Marpaung|Gary M. Iskak
title: Ada Apa dengan Cinta?
